item.description:
Just wanted to introduce a new location SGT opened in the DR.... luxury beachfront, pool, hot tub, guided surfing everyday with transportation, catered meals, yoga/surf program and lots more http://www.sassglobal... bob@sassglobaltravel.com

Looks like the price is $1300 per person for a week.

Some details:

Beachfront accomodations - only camp in Cabarete on the beach, pool and hot tub, we only do small groups of 8 or less, more intimate, some of the other camps have 20, 30 or more

Catered meals everyday, prepared by our Dominican hosts we bring in breakfast every morning with juice and fresh coffee. Dinners the same except we take clients out a few night as well. Lunch is on your own but, bag lunches are available.

Surfing - completely guided every day with transportation to any surf spot on the north coast. THis is not available im most camps around, have to have your own transportation.Guided by Jesmarin Puente the head of the Dominican Surf Federation and a good guy to know in the  water.

************************

This event post is to get an idea of the interest. We can work out details as we go, depending on the interest. If you have questions - please feel welcome to post them on here, that way we can plan this as a group so that everyone is happy! :)
item.name: New Surf Camp in Dominican Republic
